attributes.action: Cut unnecessary government jobs and cap all MPs pay rises to 1%
attributes.additional_details:
And all MP’s additional benefits should be cut or scrapped as they get all housing paid for plus travel expenses 
Payments for attending the House of Commons should be scrapped because why should they get paid extra for doing the job they are getting paid for in the first place 

Know one has made then do the job they are In they chose to apply for the role they are in 

The rest of the uk has felt the strain of the cut backs of the government but I say it’s time for the MP’s to feel the burden
attributes.background: For far to long the government has been capping public service pay rises and allowing councils to up council tax prices but all the MP’s have pay rises above 10% and have all of their expenses paid for including houses or flats and big pensions and early retirement with full pensions

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government. 

You can find out how to contact IPSA here: 

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
